deleteConfirmationDialog.title: Delete Chat?
deleteConfirmationDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this Chat? This action cannot be undone. Chat name:

gdpr.heading: Cookie Policy
gdpr.description: We use cookies to offer a better browsing experience, analyze site traffic. By clicking accept, you consent to our privacy policy & use of cookies.

necessary.label: Necessary cookies
necessary.description: Used for cookie control and application monitoring. Can't be turned off.

analytics.label: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: Used to control Analytics to track user behavior.

auth.title: Welcome to Cognitic Chat
auth.description: Log in to your account to start chatting.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: You can change the settings for the AI model here. The settings will apply right away to the next generated text.

message.initialMessage:
Welcome to Cognitic Chat, your AI assistant that understands large databases. 

 Harness the incredible power of AI assistants, like ChatGPT, but for your own codebase. To demonstrate this technology, we present a chat with our favorite LangChain. 

 Enter your own question about Langchain in the text box, or try one of the examples to get started.
message.improveText: Help us improve. How was this answer?
message.example2: Create a tutorial on how to use buffer memory.
message.example3: Store pdf in vectore database and chat with it.

conversation.disclaimer: Cognitic Chat may provide inaccurate information about the Langchain codebase. If you find any mistakes, please let us know so we can do better job next-time.

notifications.clipboardAPIError: Clipboard API not supported by your browser, please copy the text manually instead
notifications.chatAPIError: An error occurred while processing your request.
